meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to agglutinate.
meanings.sent1: Her agglutinabilities were evident in her skillful ability to combine different elements.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the agglutinabilities of various substances in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The chef's agglutinabilities in creating new recipes always amazed his customers.
meanings.sent4: The team's agglutinabilities in working together seamlessly led to their success.
meanings.sent5: The artist's agglutinabilities in blending colors created a beautiful masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: The patient's blood sample showed strong agglutinabilities under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The agglutinabilities of the glue made it perfect for sticking things together.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's agglutinabilities allowed him to quickly form alliances with other heroes.
meanings.sent4: The team's agglutinabilities in problem-solving made them unbeatable in escape rooms.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's agglutinabilities in bringing students together created a harmonious classroom environment.
